text: Reginald Johnson (born December 16, 1989) is an American basketball player who is currently playing for Dunkin' Raptors of the TBL. Standing at and weighing , Johnson usually plays at center. He played college basketball for the Miami Hurricanes. ==Professional career== In October 2014, Johnson signed with SPM Shoeters Den Bosch of the DBL.Reggie Johnson volgende center SPM Shoeters (Reggie Johnson next center SPM Shoeters) In November 2015, he signed with the Malaysian team Westports Malaysia Dragons of the ASEAN Basketball League. KL Dragons tab Reggie Johnson, ex Den Bosch In June 2016, Johnson returned to Southeast Asia, this time to Thailand to play for the Mono Vampire Basketball Club of the Thailand Basketball League. However, at early January 2018, Johnson left the club to return to the United States due to personal reasons. He was eventually replaced by Maltese-Italian Samuel Deguara. In March 2018, Johnson signed with the Rain or Shine Elasto Painters of the Philippine Basketball Association as their import for the 2018 PBA Commissioner's Cup. ==Statistics== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%; text- align:right" !SeasonFIBA.com Profile !Team !League !PPG !RPG !APG !EFF |- | align=left | 2014–15 || align=left | SPM Shoeters Den Bosch || align=left | DBL || 12.4 || 8.3 || 1.8 || 16.9 |} ==References== ==External links== *DBL Profile *Eurobasket profile *DraftExpress profile Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Malaysia Category:American expatriate basketball people in the Netherlands Category:American expatriate basketball people in the Philippines Category:American expatriate basketball people in Thailand Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from North Carolina Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Delaware 87ers players Category:Dutch Basketball League players Category:Heroes Den Bosch players Category:Kuala Lumpur Dragons players Category:Miami Hurricanes men's basketball players Category:Philippine Basketball Association imports Category:Rain or Shine Elasto Painters players Category:Sportspeople from Winston-Salem, North Carolina
title: Reggie Johnson (basketball, born 1989)
